name.ja: AssistEase - アクセシビリティの向上
name.th: AssistEase - การเข้าถึงที่ดีขึ้น
name.vi: AssistEase - Khả năng truy cập tốt hơn

short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Enhance Your Reading & Writing With AssistEase: Customize Fonts, Colors, Spacing & More! Perfect For Accessibility & Productivity.
short.th: ปรับปรุงการอ่านของคุณ
short.vi: Nâng cao khả năng đọc của bạn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AssistEase - Better Accessibility & Productivity is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your online reading, writing, and overall web browsing experience. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone who spends a significant amount of time on the web, AssistEase provides a suite of customization tools to improve accessibility and productivity. With features to modify font, font size, word spacing, letter spacing, line height, text color, text alignment, link decoration, link emphasis, and more, AssistEase ensures a tailored web experience for all users.

Key Features: -

Font Customization:

1. Font Selection: Choose from a wide array of fonts to match your reading or writing preference.
2. Font Size Adjustment: Easily adjust the font size to enhance readability.
3. Word Spacing: Modify the space between words to reduce eye strain and improve text clarity.
4. Letter Spacing: Customize the spacing between letters for better text visibility and aesthetic appeal.

Text Formatting:

1. Line Height Adjustment: Adjust the line height to create a comfortable reading flow.
2. Text Color: Change the color of the text to improve contrast and visibility, suitable for various lighting conditions.
3. Text Alignment: Align text to the left, right, center, or justify for optimal layout customization.

Link Customization:

1. Link Color: Customize the color of hyperlinks to make them stand out or blend in with the text.
2. Link Decoration: Add or remove underline, overline, or strikethrough effects on links.
3. Link Emphasis: Highlight important links with different styles for better navigation.

Additional Tools:

1. Screenshot Tool: Capture and save screenshots of web pages with ease for reference or sharing.
1. Print Functionality: Print web pages with your customized settings to maintain readability and formatting.

Accessibility Enhancements:

AssistEase is designed with accessibility in mind, providing tools that help users with visual impairments or reading difficulties customize web content to suit their needs. By adjusting fonts, colors, spacing, and alignment, AssistEase ensures a comfortable and accessible web browsing experience for everyone.

How to Use AssistEase?

1. Install the Extension: Add AssistEase to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Open the Extension: Click on the AssistEase icon in your browser toolbar to access the settings.
3. Customize Your Settings: Use the intuitive interface to adjust fonts, font sizes, spacing, colors, and more according to your preferences.
4. Apply Changes: The changes will be applied in real-time, allowing you to see the impact immediately.
5. Use Additional Tools: Take advantage of the screenshot and print functionalities for further customization and convenience.

AssistEase - Better Accessibility & Productivity is the ultimate tool for anyone looking to enhance their web browsing experience through comprehensive text customization and accessibility features. Whether you need to adjust font sizes for better readability, change text colors for improved contrast, or customize link styles for better navigation, AssistEase has you covered.

Download AssistEase today and take control of your web content customization for a better, more accessible online experience!
